channel.title: Help
channel.description: Im really new to this scar stuff, and I don't know the first thing about it. Can somebody please post a simple autofighter maybe autoheals but trains on rats in varroc sewers and ive looked at some of the other autotrainer scripts but it says select colour and has numbers. How do you know what number a colour is?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Ok, when you open scar, and pick a colour with the vial thing at the top, it SHOULD at the bottom show either something like this:

(452, 726) Being the X,Y coords you got it from and 57846547 Being the Color you got at those X,Y coords.

Now, what to do with those you ask? If you wanted to click on the coords you would do:

Mouse(452,726,3,3,true)

And what to do with the color.

Copy and Paste it to where it says it needs it.

So if you needed the colour of a cow, you would click the vial type thing at the top (green) and click over what you needed.

Read full topic
